article.title: AFRL Awards Sensor Suite Theater Evaluation Contract
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems Corporation, San Diego, California, is being awarded a $33,280,877 cost-plus-fixed-fee contract for integrated sensor suite theater evaluation and test effort to develop an innovative counter-improvised explosive device capability.Â U.S. Air Force Research Laboratory, Wright-Patterson Air Force Base, Ohio, is the contracting activity.
